actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer S. 279, entitled "A bill for the relief of the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 279 (private relief) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 279, entitled "A bill for the relief of the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
